description: A delicious and easy sweet treat, this chocolate coconut slice is made from ingredients you probably already have in the house.
keywords: Slice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Coconut Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180.C. Lightly grease a slice tin.
For the base, combine sifted flour, sugar, and desiccated coconut. Add the 125g melted butter and mix well. Press into slice tin. Bake for 20 minutes.
For the chocolate coconut icing, sift the icing sugar and cocoa in a bowl and add the shredded coconut (or use desiccated coconut if that's all you have), melted butter and milk. Spread onto slice.
Refrigerate until the chocolate coconut slice has set and then cut into squares.
